nodes.name: A Tragedy Elaborated
nodes.summary: Rewrites and expands the suicide note written by Jeleen, the Imperial Cult priest at Fort Frostmoth, upon learning of the passing of his lover Mirisa, elaborating on their relationship and his feelings for her.

nodes.name: Barter Gold Adjuster
nodes.summary: Allows customizing merchants' barter gold using MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Tools of the Secret Master
nodes.summary: Adds Secret Master lockpicks, probes, and alchemy apparatus to the game.

nodes.name: Accurate Tooltip Stats
nodes.summary: Implements more accurate, context-dependent tooltip displays for weapon damage and armor ratings, using MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Accurate Thrown Weapon Tooltips
nodes.summary: Doubles the displayed damage in thrown weapon tooltips, so it will accurately reflect how the game determines their damage.

nodes.name: Rational Names Lite
nodes.summary: Adjusts item names for logic, consistency, convenience, sorting, personal preference, and distingushing between items. Plugin and MWSE-lua versions included.

nodes.name: Weight of the World
nodes.summary: Allows customizing how max encumbrance is calculated in various ways, plus a more accurate encumbrance display.

nodes.name: Attribute Effect Tweaks
nodes.summary: Tweaks how Restore/Damage Attribute works on the player. Required by certain mods. No meaningful gameplay effect on its own.

nodes.name: CCCP Magicka Regen
nodes.summary: Implements the magicka regen functionality of Class-Conscious Character Progression (CCCP), without any of that mod's other features.

nodes.name: Unstretched Videos
nodes.summary: Adds black bars to the sides of the vanilla game videos, including the Bloodmoon videos, so they won't appear stretched when playing in widescreen (16:9).

nodes.name: Waterfall Lights Remover
nodes.summary: Removes the inexplicable glowing blue lights around waterfalls in Vivec and Molag Mar.

nodes.name: Under Construction
nodes.summary: Construction materials and scaffolding are now visible at the Great House strongholds during construction of the later stages.

nodes.name: Save the Date
nodes.summary: Most Daedric quests can be started only on the Daedric Prince's summoning day - one day a year - and only with an appropriate offering.

nodes.name: Rational Names
nodes.summary: Makes various changes to item names for more convenient inventory sorting, and enables names to exceed Morrowind's limit of 31 characters.

nodes.name: Propylon Index Renamer
nodes.summary: Renames propylon indexes so they'll group together in the inventory.

nodes.name: Soulgem Renamer
nodes.summary: Renames soulgems so they'll group together in the inventory. Uses MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Potion Renamer
nodes.summary: Renames potions so they'll sort rationally in the inventory, first by effect and then by quality. Uses MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Useful Bound Armor
nodes.summary: Bound armor now uses the normal armor rating formula, taking light armor skill into account, instead of just providing the base rating regardless of skill.

nodes.name: Fortify MAX
nodes.summary: Causes Fortify Magicka and Fortify Fatigue to affect the maximum as well as the current stat.

nodes.name: No Thank You
nodes.summary: Adds a cancel button to Temple shrines and Imperial Cult altars.

nodes.name: Daedricwind
nodes.summary: Font replacement combining Daedric letters with English punctuation and numerals, allowing you to replace the regular font and play the game in Daedric.

nodes.name: No Auto Vanity Camera
nodes.summary: Disables automatic switching to vanity camera due to inactivity. Does not prevent manually enabling vanity camera.

nodes.name: No Taunting
nodes.summary: Disables the "taunt" option in the persuasion menu, using MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Enchant Capacity Rebalance
nodes.summary: Adjusts the enchant capacities of weapons, armor and clothing for balance and consistency. An MWSE version and a plugin version are included.

nodes.name: Better Music System - MUSE Version
nodes.summary: A collection of custom MUSE config files that (mostly) implement the functionality of BTB's version of Better Music System.

nodes.name: Blighted Blight
nodes.summary: Implements the possibility of contracting blight diseases while out in a blight storm, using MWSE-lua.

nodes.name: Enhanced Detection Lite
nodes.summary: Lite version of Enhanced Detection that adds the cool new visual effects without changes such as new magic effects and spells. Includes less lite version with two new effects only.

nodes.name: MWSE Hide the Skooma
nodes.summary: Automatically hides your drugs so you don't have to dump them on the floor in order to trade. Uses MWSE, no plugin required.

nodes.name: MWSE Daleth's Book Jackets
nodes.summary: An MWSE implementation of Daleth's Book Jackets, using MWSE-lua to give each book a unique cover with no plugins required.

nodes.name: No Console
nodes.summary: Disables the console. That's it.

nodes.name: Limited Recall
nodes.summary: This configurable MWSE mod allows you to limit the casting of Recall in various ways.

nodes.name: Weather Chances Adjuster
nodes.summary: Allows you to configure the weather chances for each of the game's regions.

nodes.name: One Life to Live
nodes.summary: Implements permadeath, with a configurable number of lives. Once you've lost your last life, you're dead forever. There are no 1-ups.

nodes.name: Dynamic Timescale
nodes.summary: Changes how quickly time passes in-game depending on where you are and what you're doing.

nodes.name: Black-Heart Blight Gimp
nodes.summary: Removes the Endurance drain from Black-Heart Blight, and adds it to Ash-chancre instead. Now Black-Heart Blight won't be as deadly to users of state-based health mods.

nodes.name: Grandfather Frost
nodes.summary: Restores Grandfather Frost, Bethesda's original vision for what became Uncle Sweetshare.

nodes.name: Pass the Time
nodes.summary: Drastically speed up time while a key is pressed, a more natural way to wait than the vanilla wait menu. Also configure the normal timescale.

nodes.name: Practice Makes Perfect
nodes.summary: Disables all methods of raising skills except for good old-fashioned practice.

nodes.name: Take a Hike
nodes.summary: Disables (almost) all methods of travel except your own two feet.

nodes.name: MWSE State-Based Health
nodes.summary: A state-based health mod implemented in MWSE. Health is now calculated based on current endurance, strength and level.

nodes.name: Class-Conscious Character Progression (CCCP)
nodes.summary: An MWSE leveling mod that implements most features of Galsiah's Character Development.

nodes.name: Ownership Overhaul
nodes.summary: Assigns ownership to the many, many items and containers that rightly should be owned but weren't, and otherwise makes adjustments to item ownership.

nodes.name: Early Transport to Mournhold
nodes.summary: Allows travel to Mournhold before the Dark Brotherhood attacks begin.

nodes.name: Consistent Keys
nodes.summary: Renames keys so they'll have a consistent naming scheme, and includes options for other tweaks to keys.

nodes.name: Creeping Blight
nodes.summary: Changes weather chances, including an increasing chance of blight throughout Vvardenfell before the Main Quest is complete. Now includes MWSE version.

nodes.name: Expansions Integrated
nodes.summary: Integrates much of the content of the Tribunal and Bloodmoon expansions within the rest of the game world.

nodes.name: Less Shunned Vampires
nodes.summary: Allows vampires to interact with most NPCs basically like normal, except with a disposition penalty.

nodes.name: At the Mountain of Madness
nodes.summary: Adds to the game a number of stories by H. P. Lovecraft.

nodes.name: Clothing Requirements
nodes.summary: Implements level requirements to equip all of Morrowind's clothing items.

nodes.name: Balanced Passive Races and Birthsigns
nodes.summary: Rebalance of races and birthsigns, based on BTB's Game Improvements, with permanent abilities in place of powers or spells.

nodes.name: There Can Be Only One
nodes.summary: Makes Daedric weapons and armor pieces unique items; there will now be only one of each piece in the game (ammunition excluded).

nodes.name: Hide the Skooma - MCP Version
nodes.summary: Modified version of ManaUser's Hide the Skooma that uses MCP's service refusal filtering feature to only hide drugs on barter. Also includes purist version.

nodes.name: Area Effect Arrows Integrated
nodes.summary: An alternative version of the official plugin Area Effect Arrows that distributes the new projectiles throughout the game world rather than dumping them all in one shop. Also includes an integrated version of BTB's Area Effect Projectiles.

nodes.name: Area Effect Arrows - No Daedric Bow
nodes.summary: An alternative version of the official plugin Area Effect Arrows that omits the Daedric Longbow in the mod's new shop. Also includes BTB's Area Effect Projectiles.

nodes.name: Adamantium Armor Integrated
nodes.summary: Places one copy of each adamantium armor piece (except the helm) in Vvardenfell. They're not for sale.

nodes.name: Siege at Firemoth Weapon Gimp
nodes.summary: Replaces two high-end weapons held by the followers in the official plugin Siege at Firemoth with less powerful weapons.

nodes.name: Elvul's Grey Blindfold
nodes.summary: Tones down the ridiculous enchantment on Elvul's Black Blindfold, from Damage Marksman to Drain Marksman.

nodes.name: Magas Volar Anti-Cheat
nodes.summary: Prevents you from getting a duplicate Daedric Crescent by removing the script from Lord Dregas Volar that teleported you back to Tel Fyr after he dies.

nodes.name: Quick Char (Necro Edit)
nodes.summary: Gives you the option of speeding through the character generation process, and optionally slows down the flow of time in-game.

nodes.name: Helm of Tohan BTBGI Patch
nodes.summary: Edits the stats of the unique Helm of Tohan from the official plugin to be in line with BTB's Game Improvements - Necro Edit.

nodes.name: UI Expansion Dark Icons
nodes.summary: Greyscale versions of UI Expansion's inventory filtering icons, which look better with a darker UI like Skyrim UI Overhaul.

nodes.name: Less Generic Nerevarine Sharn Quest Fix
nodes.summary: Patch for Less Generic Nerevarine 1.4 that addresses a minor quest bug.

nodes.name: Skyrim UI Menu Color Fix
nodes.summary: Modified versions of "Mod Config" and "Continue" main menu text, for use with Skyrim UI Overhaul.

nodes.name: Caverns Bump Mapped Fix
nodes.summary: Fixed versions of two meshes in Lougian's Caverns Bump Mapped and Bloodmoon Caverns Bump Mapped.

nodes.name: DNGDR Quest Finisher
nodes.summary: Causes the last two journal entries of the new quest added by Darknut's Greater Dwemer Ruins to mark the quest as finished.

nodes.name: MGG Weathers Darker Nights
nodes.summary: Weather Adjuster config file, using Morrowind Graphics Guide Shaders Skyrim-Style as a base, with darker nights.

nodes.name: Vampire Stat Gains Fix
nodes.summary: The attribute and skill gains that go along with being a vampire no longer count toward the attribute and skill cap of 100.

nodes.name: Museum Quest Finisher
nodes.summary: Causes the sole journal entry of Tribunal's "The Museum" quest to mark that quest as finished so it won't appear on your active quest list.

nodes.name: LGNPC Seyda Neen - Firemoth Compatibility
nodes.summary: Edited version of LGNPC Seyda Neen 2.00 with Sellus Gravius' new greetings removed, so that Siege at Firemoth will work as expected.

nodes.name: Greater Dwemer Interiors Ebernanit Fix
nodes.summary: Edited version of the required master file for Darknut's Greater Dwemer Interiors version 1.2 addressing an issue with the Daedric ruin Ebernanit.

nodes.name: Dwemer Observing Station
nodes.summary: Adds a new dungeon, the "Dwemer Observing Station," underwater in Lake Amaya, north of Pelagiad.

nodes.name: True Lights and Darkness - Necro Edit
nodes.summary: Modified version of True Lights and Darkness that reverts some of TLAD's more radical color changes, removes the flicker effect from most lights, plus a few other changes. Includes MWSE mod implementing light source changes, plus modular

nodes.name: Level Up Birthsign Remover State-Based HP Fix
nodes.summary: Edited version of Level Up Birthsign Remover that addresses a bug when used in conjunction with Talrivian's State-Based HP.

nodes.name: Timescale6
nodes.summary: Sets the timescale global variable to 6 (one minute of real time equals six minutes of in-game time) instead of the vanilla value of 30.

nodes.name: Economy Adjuster Adjustments
nodes.summary: Edited versions of the Merchant Skills and Crime modules of HotFusion's Economy Adjuster, based on the "BTB Edit" version by BTB, with additional changes.

nodes.name: BTB's Game Improvements - Necro Edit
nodes.summary: Modified version of BTB's Game Improvements, with most modules merged, plus BTB's edits from his modified versions of Morrowind Advanced and Service Requirements, with many changes and additions.

nodes.name: Darker Morrowind Mods
nodes.summary: These plugins lower the ambient light, sunlight and fog light values for the new interior cells added by various mods.

nodes.name: No Unnatural Lights
nodes.summary: Disables all unnatural light sources in the game by changing the radius of the relevant lights to zero.

nodes.name: Atlas Texture Collection
nodes.summary: A collection of atlas textures, generated from various texture replacers.
